sec.div: C5. Narratives about Public Health and Climate Change
sec.p: What made you first get engaged in climate change work? Can you tell me what, when, or who made you start caring about it or thinking it was an important issue?
What do you find most rewarding about it?

Can you tell me a story about an accomplishment or something you feel really good about in the work you are doing?
Why does that story stick in your mind?
How does that story make you feel?
What is the most disheartening aspect of your work on climate change? How do you deal with that?
